about_the_game:
The demo is 2-3 hours long and the progress will carry over to the full version if you decide to purchase it.

You are known as F4stTurt13 on the net, a grey hat, earning a living by completing bug bounties. A few years ago you lost the motivation to go out, in the real world, and now the idea of leaving your apartment makes you feel anxious. Unexpectedly, you’ll find yourself in the midst of conspiracies and on a dangerous path to uncover the truth.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, including topics like suicide, mental health, drug use, violence, and death. 2D pixel art graphics of killings are shown in a few instances. Illegal activities (mostly hacking) are portrayed. Occasional swearing is present but censored.

detailed_description:
The demo is 2-3 hours long and the progress will carry over to the full version if you decide to purchase it.

You are known as F4stTurt13 on the net, a grey hat, earning a living by completing bug bounties. A few years ago you lost the motivation to go out, in the real world, and now the idea of leaving your apartment makes you feel anxious. Unexpectedly, you’ll find yourself in the midst of conspiracies and on a dangerous path to uncover the truth.
name: Night Hacking Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel/AMD Quad Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p (Full HD) or higher resolution recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An interactive story about hacking, unveiling secrets, chatting with people, and searching for purpose.
